newsitem.title: USA: Option Care to co-develop Ohio care center.
newsitem.headline: Option Care to co-develop Ohio care center.

text.p: Option Care Inc said Thursday it will co-develop an ambulatory care center in the Cincinnati area as part of an agreement with the Drake Center.

The center will help expand the patient infusion service choices for Option Care's Cincinnati office, while extending the services offered by Drake Center, a 316-bed facility, said Option Care. Both partners will run the ambulatory center, which fills the gap between hospital and home treatment.
Option Care is a full-service home health care provider that manages a national network of more than 180 offices.
The company's stock was up 1/8 at 5-3/8.
